page.title: 11 ASH PARISH CHURCH
page.content:
{Ash Parish Church}is consecrated to the Holy Trinity.The oldest part of the church is the nave which was built in 1841.The cahncel was added in 1889,followed by the vestry in 1903 and the porch in 1913.The tower was built in 1919 as a memorial to the dead of the 1914_18 war. The present vicar is{Prebendary {Peter Coney}who is also the vicar of Martock.A retired priest,{Canon {Stephenson}helps the vicar in the parish. Services are held in the church every Sunday and there is one weekday service on Thursdays.There are special services at festivals like Christmas,Easter and Harvest.
Katie Parker,Emily Gay,Clare Booth.
